cause.description:
Iranican is the name that took the team about 3 months to come up with. Among the list with 40 other candidates, Iranican, a combination of Iranian and American, made it to the very end as the official name of the TV Program.
Our program is a youth television program that identifies, analyzes, and suggests solutions to Iranian American issues. Ultimately, we hope to project a positive and representative image of Iranian Americans.
Values:
Focus We are responsive to the needs of our viewers. We are committed to developing new channels (avenues) of communication with our existing and potential viewers.
Innovation We commit to continuous improvement of our programs. We seek to develop novel approaches to satisfy the unmet needs of our viewers.
Collaboration We seek to build working relationships with people and organizations that share a common interest with us.
Teamwork As a team, we communicate regularly and work towards achieving a shared goal.
Respect We embrace the diversity of our viewers and respect individual differences, ideas and contributions in every endeavor.
Commitment We pledge to devote the necessary time and energy to the pursuit of our mission. We promise our actions shall be consistent with the spirit of our values.
1. Co-Hosts
2. Crew
3. Correspondence
cause.mission: Present a show that connects to young Iranian-Americans as well as American-Iranians, which is both educational and entertaining.
cause.name: IRANICAN
